entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
